cdata.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 170, Number 154 (Tuesday, October 8, 2024)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. GARAMENDI:H.R. 9943.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article 1, Section 8 of the United States ConstitutionThe single subject of this legislation is.To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize certainclaims for personal injury or death caused by medicalmalpractice onboard certain naval vessels, and for otherpurposes.[Page H5861]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.title: Seaman Danyelle Luckey Military Medical Accountability Amendment Act of 2024

item.title: Seaman Danyelle Luckey Military Medical Accountability Amendment Act of 2024
Seaman Danyelle Luckey Military Medical Accountability Amendment Act of 2024
To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize certain claims for personal injury or death caused by medical malpractice onboard certain naval vessels, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
